title: Is Romeo Being A Diva?!
description:
Has it ever seemed like your family has more fun when you’re not around? Like, when you’re out of town, at school, or even at work it just seems like all the fun stuff happens when you’re not there. Well, this is the case for our producer Romeo who feels like everyone should just shut down and not do anything when he’s gone.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
